Reviews.Title: Not a TVs expert
Reviews.Author: Donte Williams
Reviews.Content: The pic in full hd is mind blowing keep in mind the is only my second hdtv and my first LED tv.when I firts turned the TV on even the Jerry springer show look much better (I dont have cable).The Ps3 game only look as good as Deff just ok if there not 1080p but they look a lot better with the HDMI cord trust me. I love the TV the only bad thing is my whole family loves the TV.ps I got the 55inch BABY BABAA`!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: JDR
Reviews.Content: I love the Smart TV capabilities! The LG seems to be good quality. It's our first LG TV, besides a Mobile phone so we'll have to see over the long run.

ProductInfo.Name: LG 50LN5700 50-Inch 1080p 120Hz LED Smart HDTV Value Bundle
